Virgo Logo

Simple and easy to use ORM module for MySQL Database and Python 2

Overview // QuickStart // Tips // Github // Issues // Sitemap  

Overview¶

Install¶

Install from pypi:

pip install virgo

Sample Code¶

>>> user = User(name="Jack", email = "Jack@gmail.com")
>>> user.save()
1L
>>> user = User.at(1).select().fetchone()
>>> user.name, user.email
(u'Jack', u'Jack@gmail.com')
>>> Post.create(name="Hello World!",user_id=1)
<models.Post object at 0x8ec492c>
>>> for post, user in (Post & User).select().fetchall():
...     print user.name, post.name
...
Jack Hello World!

Run Tests¶

Clone virgo from Github ,and then:

cd tests/
nosetests

Build Status¶

Read Document¶

Clone virgo from Github ,and then:

cd docs/
make html

License¶

The license :BSD.Short and sweet.
